scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run client" "npm run dev-server" "npm run python-server"
scripts.prod: concurrently "npm run client" "npm run server" "npm run python-server"
scripts.prod-build: npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client && npm start
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
